channel.title: Bigfoot Information Project Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Bigfoot Information Project
channel.description: Occasional conversations with leading researchers and investigators regarding the animal commonly referred to as bigfoot.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Bigfoot Information Project Podcast
channel.itunes:summary: Occasional conversations with leading researchers and investigators regarding the animal commonly referred to as bigfoot.

item.title: BIPcast 6: Area X
item.itunes:author: Bigfoot Information Project
item.description: Night operations in the Ouachita Mountains with the TBRC plus an update on Operation Forest Vigil.
item.itunes:subtitle: Night operations in the Ouachita Mountains with the TBRC plus an update on Operation Forest Vigil.

item.title: BIPcast 5: Bigfoot in the Big Thicket
item.itunes:author: Bigfoot Information Project
item.description: While traipsing around the Big Thicket National Preserve in Southeast Texas, Brian gets the scoop on the TBRC's Operation Forest Vigil. Interviewed are Daryl Colyer, Ken Helmer, and Chris Buntenbah.
item.itunes:subtitle: While traipsing around the Big Thicket National Preserve in Southeast Texas, Brian gets the scoop on the TBRC's Operation Forest Vigil. Interviewed are Daryl Colyer, Ken Helmer, and Chris Buntenbah.

item.title: BIPcast 4: Sasquatch on the Oklahoma Prairie
item.itunes:author: Bigfoot Information Project
item.description: Live from the Oklahoma prairie, the BIPcast follows a multi-year investigation of sasquatch encounters near a small Native American community. Investigators Alton Higgins and Roger Roberts are interviewed. See related photos at http://tinyurl.com/2bv7jw
item.itunes:subtitle: Live from the Oklahoma prairie, the BIPcast follows a multi-year investigation of sasquatch encounters near a small Native American community. Investigators Alton Higgins and Roger Roberts are interviewed. See related photos at http://tinyurl.com/2bv7jw

item.title: BIPcast 3: Rick Noll (remix)
item.itunes:author: Bigfoot Information Project
item.description: Remixed! Easier to listen to! Grows hair on bald heads! Live from Skookum Meadows, WA, field researcher Rick Noll discusses his experience investigating reports and his thoughts on possible sasquatch habitat and behavior.
item.itunes:subtitle: Remixed! Easier to listen to! Grows hair on bald heads! Live from Skookum Meadows, WA, field researcher Rick Noll discusses his experience investigating reports and his thoughts on possible sasquatch habitat and behavior.

item.title: BIPcast 2: Scott Herriott (MP3)
item.itunes:author: Bigfoot Information Project
item.description: Filmmaker Scott Herriott discusses the Patterson-Gimlin film, his own bigfoot video, what's needed to prove the existence of bigfoot (absent a body), and his thoughts on the Bigfoot Field Researchers Organization (BFRO)
item.itunes:subtitle: Filmmaker Scott Herriott discusses the Patterson-Gimlin film, his own bigfoot video, what's needed to prove the existence of bigfoot (absent a body), and his thoughts on the Bigfoot Field Researchers Organization (BFRO)

item.title: BIPcast 1: Kathy Moskowitz Strain (MP3)
item.itunes:author: Bigfoot Information Project
item.description: Anthropologist Kathy Moskowitz Strain discusses the Yokuts Hairy Man Pictograph, Native American beliefs, the founding of the Alliance of Independent Researchers (AIBR)
item.itunes:subtitle: Anthropologist Kathy Moskowitz Strain discusses the Yokuts Hairy Man Pictograph, Native American beliefs, the founding of the Alliance of Independent Researchers (AIBR)
